page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content:
In our community there is a place called California Country park.The public use this park to go fishing and take their dogs for a walk.Children paddle in the paddling pools and play on the swings and climbing frames.There is a caravan site on the premises.It is a very nice place to go.
At Gorse Ride you can go to Cubs,Brownies and Guides.Guides and cubs are held at Gorse Ride Community Centre.In the Centre there is a Youth Club and a toddlers playgroup.
California Ratepayers Hall is one place where you can go for ballet,tap or modern dancing.They hold jumble sales there and clubs for old people.There are also playgroups for toddlers.
